channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Takaro Tribe
channel.desc: T??karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa R??kau, Pond K?k??, P? and Waea Wao live.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: With the maero no longer a threat, Kura invites Ruiha to join them on the journey up the maunga to find the godstick and hopefully Rangi too. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.title: Kia Mau
channel.desc: A fun sing-along M?ori performing arts series for children. (R).

channel.title: Tamariki Haka
channel.desc: Children from kura across the country showcase their haka skills. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mataora Digital
channel.desc: Amazing content curated for rangatahi, wh?nau and pakeke. Made by the Mataora team. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube Haka
channel.desc: The grand finale of the season of Te N?tube. We get to see Te N?tube Haka shine and perform on stage. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Oranga Ng?kau
channel.desc: Yvonne Te Wanihi Edwards presents uniquely M?ori exercise workouts for young and old to keep fit and healthy. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Easy Eats 2
channel.desc: Join Hera Te Kurapa as she cooks up delicious, restaurant quality dishes. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Wh?nau Bake-Off
channel.desc: A baking show that pits wh?nau against each other in a battle for bragging rights. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hangi Pit Masters
channel.desc: Rewi meets with Ben Bayly, head chef at The Grove. Ben tells us about his international cooking career and we find out what he has planned for Taste of Auckland. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Nurturing Hope
channel.desc: A heart-warming factual reality tv series that follows Kaikohe mother, first language speaker Clara Aperahama Kopa and the journey to improve the life of her severely disabled son, Mungzy. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Treaty Road
channel.desc: Erin and Saxon visit Treaty 2 territory. People were forcibly displaced to create a national park. Attempts to seek justice reveal that Canadian law offers no protection to Indigenous people.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Duke
channel.desc: In 1961, Kempton Bunton, a 60 year old taxi driver, steals Goya's portrait of the Duke of Wellington from the National Gallery in London. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Day One Shorts 2024
channel.desc: A Korean immigrant dad, working as a construction painter, mentors a new young worker while simultaneously battling melancholia and guilt as he awaits the arrival of his family. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.title: Ako
channel.desc: P?nia Papa presents M?ori language lessons for intermediate-level learners. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?hura
channel.desc: Niua and Hura travel to Te Rotorua-nui-a-Kahumatamomoe to uncover the origins of thermal energy and how it was brought from Hawaiki to Aotearoa. (R).

channel.title: Island of Mystery

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Haka Life Wharekura
channel.desc: Follow reigning champions, Te Wharekura o Hoani Waititi Marae, as they compete against other kura tuarua at Ng? Kapa Haka Kura Tuarua o Aotearoa 2024 in Whakat?. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Kura Tuatahi
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Kura Tuatahi.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pukuhohe
channel.desc: Game show testing the M?ori language skills of two teams. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Tini o Rehua
channel.desc: NEW: Featuring Te Tini o Rehua, Whakaata M?ori presents Te Matatini o Te K?hui Maunga - the ultimate celebration of haka excellence. This is haka at its finest.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: NEW: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Homesteads
channel.desc: A cultural trailblazer, Hone Tuwhare was one of New Zealand's most celebrated poets and one of the first M?ori to gain prominence in English-language literature. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Nomad
channel.desc: NEW: Explores the contemporary experience of people living off the land in Te Waipounamu, seen through the eyes of a young M?ori nomad intent on living off the land like his t?puna before him.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: NEW: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Bones of Our Past
channel.desc: PREMIERE: A documentary about Takahanga Marae in Kaik?ura. Rangi Soloman (K?ti Kuri) said he wanted to ?build the future of our people on the bones of our past?. Last year was its 30th anniversary.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Wairua (Mts)
channel.desc: The topic of wairua will be covered and the question will be answered from a M?ori perspective of ancient times, through to the present. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Iconic archival series documenting the unique stories and histories of M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.title: Haka Regionals 2024
channel.desc: Highlights from the Haka Regionals 2024. Te Hoe Ki M?tangireia. Full bracket. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: NEW: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Moon Tide Fishing Grass Roots
channel.desc: In the R?kaunui maramataka phase near the Manawat?whi, Nore, Mori and Dazza are hoping for some big warehenga. But they didn't count on Dazza hooking up a takeketonga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tui Teka's Trail
channel.desc: NEW: Tui helps catch Appaloosa Rex who likes to roam Tokomaru Bay and readies Arthur the series starter horse to reunite with his owners.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tales From Zambia
channel.desc: NEW: Explore Zambia's diverse wildlife, from majestic elephants to playful baboons, through this captivating collection. Venture into breathtaking habitats and witness fascinating animal behaviours.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Michif Country
channel.desc: NEW: A glimpse into the St. Laurent M?tis nation on Lake Manitoba, taking viewers on a journey with the most active and talented hunters, trappers, and fishermen in the community.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Toa Hunter Gatherer
channel.desc: Adventurer Owen Boynton presents a holistic view of gathering kai as he travels the country to meet like-minded kaitiaki and outdoor experts. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Piri's Tiki Tour
channel.desc: Combining his love for Rugby with his skill at diving and hunting, All Black Piri Weepu sets out on a tour around Aotearoa meeting up with locals. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: East Coast Rising
channel.desc: The team struggles to find their first win, and player Sam Parkes helps the community fight against obesity. (R).
